Room.Name: Ettercap Burrow
Room.ShortDescription: You are burrowed down in the filthy nest of the Ettercaps.
Room.LongDescription: The nest is very old, and generations of ettercaps have lived and died here, with everything simply getting packed down into the floor of matted debris. The remains of previous adventurers are mixed with the remains of dead ettercaps, and all of it is underfoot in the mass of stinking vegetation making the nest. The largest and oldest female sleeps here almost constantly, waiting for the others to bring her food from outside.
